description:
Pang is a Level 2 Akuma who attempted to help http://anidb.net/ch32757 [Road Kamelot] locate http://anidb.net/ch7368 [Miranda Lotto]`s Innocence.
Pang has four heads and five faces, counting the Level 1 Akuma face, and bracers on his wrists. He also seems to be wearing vertically striped trousers. Like all sentient Akuma, Pang enjoys killing. He is also a little simpleminded, shown playing a game of "Rock, Paper, Scissors" with http://anidb.net/ch32757 [Ice] and http://anidb.net/ch32758 [Kazekiri] to decide who would kill http://anidb.net/ch7347 [Allen], and then shown getting mad when Allen attacked them while they were playing.
Source: D.Gray-man Wiki
name: Pang
